value.title: Generate Year and Month Combinations in Power BI Report using DAX
value.excerpt: A common requirement when reporting data with a Date axis is to be able to see the year and the month in a short form beside each other. Formats such as 2021 Jan, or Jan 2021, or even Jan 21, or 2021-01 are very popular. In Power BI, ideally, you should have a Date dimension with columns for this. However,

value.title: Page Level Security workaround in Power BI
value.excerpt: If you want to control the access to the Power BI report pages (or tabs) in a way that some users see some pages, and some others see other pages, we need something called page-level security. value.title: Power BI Get Data from Google Sheets
value.excerpt: Power BI can get data from Google Sheet now. This functionality is released just yesterday and announced in both Power BI and Power Query blogs. value.title: Wholesale and retail execution in composite models
value.excerpt: In composite models, any query can be executed on the remote model (wholesale execution) or by mixing local and remote engines together (retail execution). This video describes the differences between the wholesale and retail modes in composite models. Article and download: https://sql.bi/736550?aff=yt

value.title: How to build a simple dashboard
value.excerpt: How to build a simple dashboard

value.title: Describe Power BI Desktop models
value.excerpt: In this module, you'll learn about the Power BI Desktop model structure, star schema design basics, analytics queries, and report visual configuration. This module provides a strong foundation on which you can learn to optimize model designs and add model calculations.

value.title: Perform analytics in Power BI¬†
value.excerpt: You will learn how to use Power BI to perform data analytical functions, how to identify outliers in your data, how to group data together, and how to bin data for analysis. You will also learn how to perform time series analysis. Finally, you will work with advanced analytic features of Power BI, such as Quick Insights, AI Insights, and the Analyze feature.

value.title: Append and Merge Tables in Power BI
value.excerpt: Learn how to quickly merge and append tables using the query editior in Power BI. Build models with multiple data sources. Contact me on LinkedIn: www.linkedin.com/in/gaelimholland
